fullText:
CHINA‚ÄôS EMERGING ROBO-CRAZE
¬†
China robot exhibitions often have women dressed up as humanoids. 
¬†
It‚Äôs fun.
¬†
I‚Äôm 90% sure that‚Äôs what this video is.
¬†

user.description: All of gaming, together. PlayTracker connects to the most popular platforms out there and unites gamer data. All games, achievements, stats - now in one place.

fullText:
Games slated to release near Silksong are being delayed to avoid competing with the most wishlisted game on Steam. 

It's probably a good idea: Silksong is so big that it has a huge overlap with every game, regardless of genre.

But not all are running... how will they fare? https://t.co/XUWgRjbRd0
